rule: A "company name" is defined as the official registered name of a business entity referenced in the input text.
input: Text: The official launch by International Business Machines Corporation was a success.
coverage:
**Company names:** International Business Machines Corporation

**People names:**

**Specific topics:** official launch

**General themes:** business launches, corporate success
validityText:
The input uses "Text" with an uppercase "T" instead of the required lowercase "text" field as specified in the input specification.
